title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-5.6 - Out-of-service hydrant systems and closure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-5.6 - Out-of-service hydrant systems and closure

State Regulations
(a) UST systems. UST systems
that are taken out of service or undergo permanent closure, must meet the
requirements of section 2.6 of this Part, with the exception of ASTs that
undergo such actions, which must meet the requirements of section 4.5 of this

Part. (b) AST
systems. AST systems that are taken out of service or undergo
permanent closure, must meet the requirements of section 4.5 of this Part, with
the exception of USTs that undergo such actions, which must meet the
requirements of section
3.5
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-5.6

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
